1.reasoning: For uncomplicated colds, minimal testing is needed. Tests help rule out complications like bacterial infections.

recommendedTests.name: Complete Blood Count (CBC)
recommendedTests.description: Measures various components of blood including white blood cells
recommendedTests.purpose: To check for signs of bacterial infection or complications

recommendedTests.name: Throat Swab Culture
recommendedTests.description: Tests for bacterial infections like strep throat
recommendedTests.purpose: To rule out bacterial infections if symptoms persist

testsToAvoid.name: Chest X-Ray
testsToAvoid.purpose: Not needed for uncomplicated colds without chest symptoms

2.reasoning: Flu testing helps confirm diagnosis and guide treatment, especially for high-risk patients.

recommendedTests.name: Rapid Influenza Test
recommendedTests.description: Quick test to detect influenza virus
recommendedTests.purpose: To confirm flu diagnosis and guide antiviral treatment

recommendedTests.name: Complete Blood Count (CBC)
recommendedTests.purpose: To check for complications and monitor infection

testsToAvoid.name: CT Scan
testsToAvoid.purpose: Not necessary unless severe complications are suspected

3.reasoning: Migraines are typically diagnosed clinically. Tests help rule out other causes of headaches.

recommendedTests.name: MRI of Brain
recommendedTests.description: Imaging test to visualize brain structure
recommendedTests.purpose: To rule out other causes of headaches if symptoms are atypical
recommendedTests.preparation: No preparation needed, but inform about metal implants

recommendedTests.name: Blood Pressure Monitoring
recommendedTests.purpose: To check for hypertension as a contributing factor

default.reasoning: Consult with a healthcare provider to determine appropriate tests based on your specific symptoms and medical history.

recommendedTests.name: Complete Blood Count (CBC)
recommendedTests.description: Basic blood test measuring various components
recommendedTests.purpose: To check overall health and detect various conditions
